column5: By nature I am a bit of a worrier and as the main trip planner for our fly ins and camping trips I can get inside my own head Newest post is up - how to maximize your enjoyment when you finally arrive at your destination https://www.northernjacks.com/post/maximize-it Cheers Andrew

If you would post these on the board I would read them for sure and I'm sure many more will. Not going to click on some random link nowadays when you can easily post it on here. Seems like a view or money grab to me. But I would for sure watch it on here either way! Goodluck and tight lines!
Hey thanks for the tips.  It's actually quite a bit of work to replicate the post here.  As of today I make $0 from the site but I understand if you don't want to link out to it. Cheers Andrew
Andrew posts links to the new content from his blog regularly here. I actually enjoy reading them a lot. 	And no, it is not money grab.
